features: The Durable Safety Razor for Women Makes Clean Shaving a Breeze - The Viking Revolution Single Blade Razors for Women offer a superior shave, leaving skin feeling soft, smooth, and free of unwanted hair and peach fuzz. Use on your legs, arm, skin, and anywhere else you see fit!

It's the Reusable Razor Women Love to Use on All Areas of the Body - With this reusable safety razor for women, ladies can quickly and convenient shave different areas of the body, including the legs, underarms, back, and even intimate areas. The stainless steel razor is gentle yet effective on the skin to provide a bump-free shave.

The Durable Reusable Razor is Designed to Last and is Even Better for the Environment - Ditch the plastic, single-use razors and enjoy the quality of the Viking Revolution Double Edge Safety Razor. The metal razor is better for the environment and is prepared with the finest materials to last long without tarnishing. Keep it in your shower or anywhere in the bathroom and use it as often as you need!

Weighted Safety Razor Provides Users with Maximum Control - No matter how often you shave, you can do so confidently using this double edge razor made with a long handle for an anti-slip grip. Easily control this beautiful gold razor when shaving, whether standing or sitting. You can even disassemble the double edge razor blade within seconds to give it a quick cleaning before using it again!

The Gorgeous Razor Gold is the Safest, Most Painless Way to Remove your Unwanted Hair at Home - Use the rose gold razor for pain-free hair removal. The closed comb safety razor puts an end to unwanted nicks and cuts, providing a safer, more enjoyable experience. It's THE safety razor of safety razors, keeping skin healthy, smooth, and hair-free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely a learning curve
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using women’s Venus style razor (5 blades) since I started shaving as a teenager. I kept getting razor burn and ingrown hairs and then saw someone on TikTok talking about this razor and how inexpensive the refills are compared to the modern razors. I LOVE my new razor. There is a definite learning curve with shaving with this type of razor and I’ve nicked myself a handful of times. But I’m getting used to it. I haven’t yet gotten razor burn or noticed any ingrown hairs.The razor also has a bit of weight to it too so that’s another thing part of the learning curve. The blades seem flimsy when you are putting the razor together, but they are definitely sharp.10/10 would recommend to anyone looking for a good razor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cannot recommend this enough!
reviews.reviewText: To preface: I'm female.Razors such as this are typically thought of as old fashioned and strictly for men.Not so anymore!I was so tired of shaving with cartridge razors, or worse, disposables. I felt like I was just spending money to throw away.Now, there's no plastic to toss into the landfill. This kit comes with 10 blades and they last a while. But buying 100 blades was super cheap.The blades are stainless steel so there's no worry of rust.Whenever the blade pulls or irritates my skin I just remove it from the razor handle and put them in a lidded mason jar. Many years from now, when the jar becomes full, I can take it to a metal recycling place to be melted down and used for a new purpose.If you're on the fence about this, please trust me.It has a slight learning curve, but as long as you don't press it hard into your skin you should be okay. After that it's so easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I just tried it and oh my gosh!! Would recommend!! Extremely close shave and left me with no razor bumps! It’s easy to cut the skin around your ankle, it’s definitely a learning curve there but other than that I recommend it!! It did great on my bikini area as well!!!! Obsessed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Feels good in the hand, works well, slightly tough to swap the blades

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not what i expected but still useful
reviews.reviewText: On first couple of uses the razor was very sharp and left smooth shave. After a couple weeks of use it has filled down but i still cut myself every use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I would give this a million stars if I could. It has been a complete game changer for my sensitive legs.i used to get itchy red spots and my hair would grow back by the next day after using the five blade razors that i thought wojld give me smooth legs.i have smoother legs and the hair takes forever to grow back.there is a bit of a learning curve to correctly use it,but I watched a few YouTube videos with tips and now it is amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't waste your money please
reviews.reviewText: I dont even normally write reviews, but I felt like I had to for this one. This is by far the worst razor I've ever used. Like as in, my Walgreens brand razor does a better job. I bought this thinking it was gonna change my life because I have pcos and my hair grows fast but no, not only did this not give me a close shave, it cut my legs so bad that two days later they are still burning, and I already have stubble. Also, I really did give this razor a fair try, I used it three times using different angles and shaving cream and I even watched YouTube videos to see if I was doing it right. However, this last time, I changed out the blade thinking maybe that was the problem, but that new blade was worse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for ladies!!! Feels so luxe, Nice length and weight.
reviews.reviewText: I am a lady who uses DE razors the last few years for legs and body, etc to cut down on buying all the plastic razors. I started out with a rose gold baili butterfly DE razor that has just started to rust after 5 years.I received this and was pleasantly surprised at how heavy it was, and the length of handle made it even easier to shave the legs.I use vokshod and wilkinson blades, but the ones that came with this worked nicely also! Not too aggressive and just sharp enough for a close shave. Highly recommend ladies!!!!!
La verdad no sabía qué esperar pero me encantóYa no uso otra cosa solo hay que tener cuidado al empezar a usarlo

Este rastrillo y las navajas originales dejan un afeitado muy al ras, preciso y excepcional. Mucho más al ras de lo que se puede con cartuchos o máquina. Con buena técnica y una buena espuma, la irritación es mínima. Eso sí; prepare bien la cara y usen abundante espuma.Cuidado* - El rastrillo es un tanto agresivo. Si nunca has usado rastrillo clásico antes, procura cuidar el ángulo, la presión, y sólo hacer movimientos rectos. De lo contrario, puede dejar un sinfín de cortadas en la cara. Aunque la curva de aprendizaje es moderada, vale la pena ya que la final te deja afeitados de primer nivel, con la piel super suave.Las navajas originales son super filosas, cortan con gran facilidad, pero no patinan para nada sobre piel seca o ligeramente seca. Las comparé con unas Feather - Las Feather no tienen tanto filo, pero patinan mucho más; cosas de gustos.En general, el kit me parece fabuloso, a buen precio, super recomendable si quieres entrar al mundo del rastrillo clásico.
Fue un regalo y quedamos con una excelente opinión
La calidad del producto es excelente, es práctico, útil y fácil de usar, a mi esposo le encantó! Es un original y excelente regalo para los hombres, no dudes en adquirirlo.

reviews.reviewerName: Víctor Manuel Rojas ToledoVíctor Manuel Rojas Toledo
reviews.reviewText: Los materiales son de buena calidad, muy cómoda. Solo falto un estuche o bolsa para guardar el n rastrillo porque la caja se va a romper con el tiempo.
